title: ID possible ?
content:
Hi people,

I wanted to know if there is a font like shown in these pictures. Is it actually a font? Or is it custom design?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/HG_6555.PNG)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/home_12_5591.jpg)

 [‹ Sport Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46963 "Go to previous forum topic") [Maple font and possible similar typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46995 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Vince1983

comments.content: Similar: [Circle Monograms](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-CIMO), [Typable Monograms](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-HAMO), and [Hexagrams/Octograms](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119080827/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-HEOC) all available at Font Bros and all from Harold’s Fonts.
